original_text: Then was the king exceedingly glad for him, and commanded that they should take Daniel up out of the den. So Daniel was taken up out of the den, and no manner of hurt was found upon him, because he believed in his God.
korean_text: 왕이 심히 기뻐서 명하여 다니엘을 굴에서 올리라 하매 그들이 다니엘을 굴에서 올린즉 그의 몸이 조금도 상하지 아니하였으니 이는 그가 자기의 하나님을 믿음이었더라

sentences.original_text: Then was the king exceedingly glad for him
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 왕은 그를 인하여 심히 기뻐하였으며

sentences.original_text: and commanded that they should take Daniel up
So Daniel was taken up out of the den
and no manner of hurt was found upon him
because he believed in his God
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그가 자기의 하나님을 믿었기 때문이었더라
